classes.description: An agent (eg. person, group, software or physical artifact).
classes.label: Agent

classes.description: A project (a collective endeavour of some kind).
classes.label: Project

classes.description: A foaf:LabelProperty is any RDF property with texual values that serve as labels.
classes.label: Label Property

predicates.description: A homepage for some thing.
predicates.label: homepage

predicates.description: A document that this thing is the primary topic of.
predicates.label: is primary topic of

predicates.description: A person known by this person (indicating some level of reciprocated interaction between the parties).
predicates.label: knows

predicates.description: Something that was made by this agent.
predicates.label: made

predicates.description: An agent that  made this thing.
predicates.label: maker

predicates.description: A  personal mailbox, ie. an Internet mailbox associated with exactly one owner, the first owner of this mailbox. This is a 'static inverse functional property', in that  there is (across time and change) at most one individual that ever has any particular value for foaf:mbox.
predicates.label: personal mailbox

predicates.description: Indicates a member of a Group
predicates.label: member

predicates.description: A page or document about this thing.
predicates.label: page

predicates.description: The primary topic of some page or document.
predicates.label: primary topic

predicates.description: A weblog of some thing (whether person, group, company etc.).
predicates.label: weblog

predicates.description: Indicates an account held by this agent.
predicates.label: account

predicates.description: Indicates the name (identifier) associated with this online account.
predicates.label: account name

predicates.description: Indicates a homepage of the service provide for this online account.
predicates.label: account service homepage

predicates.description: An AIM chat ID
predicates.label: AIM chat ID

predicates.description: A location that something is based near, for some broadly human notion of near.
predicates.label: based near

predicates.description: A current project this person works on.
predicates.label: current project

predicates.description: A depiction of some thing.
predicates.label: depiction

predicates.description: A thing depicted in this representation.
predicates.label: depicts

predicates.description: The family name of some person.
predicates.label: familyName

predicates.description: The first name of a person.
predicates.label: firstName

predicates.description: The underlying or 'focal' entity associated with some SKOS-described concept.
predicates.label: focus

predicates.description: The gender of this Agent (typically but not necessarily 'male' or 'female').
predicates.label: gender

predicates.description: The given name of some person.
predicates.label: Given name

predicates.description: An ICQ chat ID
predicates.label: ICQ chat ID

predicates.description: An image that can be used to represent some thing (ie. those depictions which are particularly representative of something, eg. one's photo on a homepage).
predicates.label: image

predicates.description: A page about a topic of interest to this person.
predicates.label: interest

predicates.description: A jabber ID for something.
predicates.label: jabber ID

predicates.description: The last name of a person.
predicates.label: lastName

predicates.description: A logo representing some thing.
predicates.label: logo

predicates.description: The sha1sum of the URI of an Internet mailbox associated with exactly one owner, the  first owner of the mailbox.
predicates.label: sha1sum of a personal mailbox URI name

predicates.description: An MSN chat ID
predicates.label: MSN chat ID

predicates.description: A Myers Briggs (MBTI) personality classification.
predicates.label: myersBriggs

predicates.description: A name for some thing.
predicates.label: name

predicates.description: A short informal nickname characterising an agent (includes login identifiers, IRC and other chat nicknames).
predicates.label: nickname

predicates.description: An OpenID for an Agent.
predicates.label: openid

predicates.description: A project this person has previously worked on.
predicates.label: past project

predicates.description: A phone,  specified using fully qualified tel: URI scheme (refs: http://www.w3.org/Addressing/schemes.html#tel).
predicates.label: phone

predicates.description: A .plan comment, in the tradition of finger and '.plan' files.
predicates.label: plan

predicates.description: A link to the publications of this person.
predicates.label: publications

predicates.description: A homepage of a school attended by the person.
predicates.label: schoolHomepage

predicates.description: A Skype ID
predicates.label: Skype ID

predicates.description: A derived thumbnail image.
predicates.label: thumbnail

predicates.description: A tipjar document for this agent, describing means for payment and reward.
predicates.label: tipjar

predicates.description: Title (Mr, Mrs, Ms, Dr. etc)
predicates.label: title

predicates.description: A topic of some page or document.
predicates.label: topic

predicates.description: A thing of interest to this person.
predicates.label: topic_interest

predicates.description: A work info homepage of some person; a page about their work for some organization.
predicates.label: work info homepage

predicates.description: A workplace homepage of some person; the homepage of an organization they work for.
predicates.label: workplace homepage

predicates.description: A Yahoo chat ID
predicates.label: Yahoo chat ID

predicates.description: The age in years of some agent.
predicates.label: age

predicates.description: The birthday of this Agent, represented in mm-dd string form, eg. '12-31'.
predicates.label: birthday

predicates.description: Indicates the class of individuals that are a member of a Group
predicates.label: membershipClass

predicates.description: A sha1sum hash, in hex.
predicates.label: sha1sum (hex)

predicates.description: A string expressing what the user is happy for the general public (normally) to know about their current activity.
predicates.label: status
